ch.aplu.android
Interface GGOrientationListener

public interface GGOrientationListener

Declarations of the notification method called when the screen orientation changes.

Method Summary
 void orientationChanged(GGNavigationListener.ScreenOrientation event)
          Event callback method called when the device orientaton changed from PORTRAIT to LANDSCAPE or vice versa.
 

Method Detail

orientationChanged

void orientationChanged(GGNavigationListener.ScreenOrientation event)
Event callback method called when the device orientaton changed from PORTRAIT to LANDSCAPE or vice versa. No event occurs if the device is set to fixed screen orientation by calling setScreenOrientation() with parameter GGNavigationListener.PORTRAIT or GGNavigationListener.LANDSCAPE.

Parameters:
event - one of two constants GGNavigationListener.ScreenOrientation.PORTRAIT or GGNavigationListener.ScreenOrientation.LANDSCAPE (same as GameGrid.PORTRAIT or GameGrid.LANDSCAPE)
